messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Immediate action to get banks lending to small businesses to escape the jobs crisis and stimulate growth; breaking up the banks; a fairer tax plan that puts money back in the pockets of ordinary families.

issues.economy: Immediate action to get banks lending to small businesses to escape the jobs crisis and stimulate economic growth; breaking up the banks.

housing.content: A fairer tax plan that puts money back in the pockets of ordinary families.

leaflet.personalStatement: After thirteen years of disappointment and failure, you’ve seen what Labour can do. You can have real change and recovery with the Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: Vince Cable MP for Liberal Democrat, Shadow Chancellor.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Make sure your voice is heard by signing up for a postal vote today using the form enclosed. Your vote could be the one that brings real change to Britain.
